title: How do I edit the screen partially captured using the smart screenshot function?
answer:
After you partially capture a screen, you can touch ![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/40dd7_zspxd.png) to edit the picture:

1.l [![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/40dd8_4yiph.png)](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/40dd8_4yiph.png): adjusting the size of the picture

2.l ![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/40dd9_3mqns.png): fuzzy processing for the part you do not want to share

3.l ![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/40dda_on6c8.png): removing the added mosaic

[![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/40ddb_itjdv.png)](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/40ddb_itjdv.png)

The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
